name: The Astral Hero
description: Immerse yourself in the astral world where you expect fierce enemies ready to tear you to shreds!Be careful any wrong move can lead you to death!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2Ghz Memory: 512 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory Storage: 250 MB available space
